com.hcs.prototype.hcs_prototype

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hcs.prototype.hcs_prototype.User
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    UserAdmin, UserNormal

    public class User
extends java.lang.Object

    User Class Singleton

    The user class implements authenticated login and register for users. The user is authenticated against a list of users found in local storage. The User class is a singleton for streamlined access across multiple activities. The object is accessed via User.getUser() and actions can be taken on this user object.
    Since:
    0.1 //TODO: version numbers in github
